description: Array of the coefficients A(n,k) in the Taylor expansion of P=Product_{i>=1} 1/(1-x^i)^n  = sum_{k>=0} A(n,k)*x^k, n>=1, k>=0.
comments: Table read by antidiagonals: entry (n,k) gives number of partitions of n objects into parts of k kinds. - _Franklin T. Adams-Watters_, Dec 28 2006
formula: G.f. A(n;x) for n-th row satisfies A(n;x) = Sum_{k=1..n} A000041(k-1)*A(n-k;x)*x^(k-1), A(0;x) = 1. - _Vladeta Jovovic_, Jan 02 2004
author: Bo T. Ahlander (ahlboa(AT)isk.kth.se), May 03 2001
